title: World Locking Tools
description: World Locking Tools provides a stable and reliable world-locked coordinate system, binding the virtual/holographic world to the physical world.
longDescription:
World Locking Tools locks the holographic space of your application to the physical world. A hologram put in position relative to physical world features will stay fixed relative to those features, and remain fixed relative to other holograms.


World Locking Tools also includes Space Pins, which reposition the scene to match real-world features like QRCodes.


More information can be found at the following links:

https://github.com/microsoft/WorldLockingTools-Unreal

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/mixed-reality/world-locking-tools/

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/mixed-reality/world-locking-tools/documentation/concepts/advanced/spacepins
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  WorldLockingTools - Manages an anchor graph which is used to make adjustments to the player pawn's pose to keep the virtual space aligned with the real world.
  •  WorldLockingToolsPawn - A sample player pawn set up appropriately for World Locking Tools pose adjustments.
  •  SpacePin - SceneComponent to add to an actor in the scene which is used to reposition the scene to match real world features.

Code Modules:

  •  WorldLockingTools - Runtime

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 12

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, HoloLens 2

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, HoloLens 2

Documentation: https://github.com/microsoft/WorldLockingTools-Unreal

Example Project: https://github.com/microsoft/WorldLockingTools-Unreal/tree/main/WLT_Project
